definition: steel (as raw material)/steel sheets, bars, tubes, ingots, wire etc

sentences.english: His job is to bend the steel to make chairs.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作就是弄彎鋼材來做椅子。

sentences.english: The building used pre-fabricated material, including 200 tonnes of steel.
sentences.chinese: 大樓用了預製材料，包括200噸鋼材。

sentences.english: It may be used for reference in developing new kind of steel and enhancing the elastic strength of autofrettage tubes.
sentences.chinese: 這對研製新鋼材，提高自緊身管彈性強度等可供借鑑。

sentences.english: Bucket cutting edges of abrasive-resistant steel of up to 500 Brinell.
sentences.chinese: 剷鬥切削刀刃爲抗磨料磨損鋼材，布氏硬度達500。

sentences.english: Steel prices still benefit from prophase effects of restricting output brings to inventory effect.
sentences.chinese: 鋼材價格上漲仍然受益於前期限產帶來的去庫存效果。

sentences.english: Most large-scale buildings now have steel supports.
sentences.chinese: 現在多數大規模的建築物都有鋼材支座。

sentences.english: The five characteristics of cold-drawn steel industry status are expounded.
sentences.chinese: 分析了冷拔鋼材行業現狀的五大特點。

sentences.english: Star Maling Glass Flake Epoxy penetrates through rust to steel substrate and stops further corrosion and undercutting .
sentences.chinese: 本產品可滲透到鋼材基層，防止鏽蝕的進一步蔓延。

sentences.english: The factory produced more steel, and all of fine quality at that.
sentences.chinese: 工廠生產了更多的鋼材，而且都是優質鋼。

sentences.english: The profile of the steel surface shall be measured with replica tape and a spring micrometer.
sentences.chinese: 鋼材表面的粗糙度應使用拓模膠帶和測微計來測量。

sentences.english: The steel market is showing a tendency to improve .
sentences.chinese: 鋼材市場有好轉的趨勢。

sentences.english: This bridge is made of steel.
sentences.chinese: 這座橋是用鋼材建造的。

sentences.english: The mechanical properties of steel have an influence on the service effect;
sentences.chinese: 鋼材的力學性能對釺頭使用效果均有一定影響。

sentences.english: Steels delivered by polishing shall have surface without defectiveness .
sentences.chinese: 磨光交貨的鋼材，表面不得有缺陷。

sentences.english: Designing with mark-up is like welding I-beams without a blueprint.
sentences.chinese: 設計過程要額外付費就好比焊接鋼材不需要藍圖。

sentences.english: How much steel is in that building?
sentences.chinese: 那座建築物，有多少鋼材用進去？

definition: producer (of goods, commodities or farm produce etc)/manufacturer/(biology) autotroph
